description: This file defines a reasoning scenario for the classic 'Trolley Problem' using an agent-based approach with external models for reasoning and language processing.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that combines a reasoning model and a language model to perform tasks.

classes.name: DeepSeek
classes.description: A model used for reasoning tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model interfacing with OpenAI's chat API.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and stream a response based on a given task.
